theory: The G-8 Arc was originally intended to be canon but was cut from the manga due to pacing concerns. The high quality of the arc and its seamless integration into the story suggest it may have been part of Oda's original vision.
author: Various One Piece fans

theory: Vice Admiral Jonathan could have been based on a real character Oda planned to introduce later. His strategic mindset and characterization are too well-developed for a simple filler antagonist.
author: One Piece community

theory: The G-8 arc serves as a thematic bridge between Sky Island and Water 7, showing the Straw Hats using intelligence and stealth rather than direct combat, foreshadowing their approach in later arcs.
author: Arc analysis enthusiasts
